favourite.article: We Cannot serve two masters. CHRIST IS HERE! Where are you? O saints Be found in Him, in resurrection not in self. Lord my empty vessel I bring again n again. School work or home Lord we consecrate all, in love for YOU.
This hymn is based on "Come, Lord, as the Spirit come" by Charles W. Fry.
Hallelujah for the Sevenfold Intensified Spirits of God!!!!! Lord, burn us....search us thoroughly!
Семикратный Дух,приди!Нас вполне восстанови! Мой любимый гимн:-)
